resume_snippet: SUMMARY: A seasoned CMC strategic, operational and business expert with 25 years of professional experience in product development, process scale-up, manufacture and global regulations with a proven record of product approvals and launches including Xiidra®, Gardasil®, RotaTeq®, Invanz® and Juvisync®. Throughout my career I have used a combination of technical, project management and interpersonal skills to build and lead high-performance organizations. CORE COMPETENCIES: CMC Strategy, Planning
